txt.en: From the dark of the great rift in Nud-melek peeks an eerily bright ore, one that you have heard named 'Narfulz' by the dwarves. It is likely that whatever shattered the bridge and the floors here churned up the Narfulz as well.\n\nIt would be wise to collect this rare ore while you are here, for it can be deemed a trophy of great worth.

'Impressive find! And it was in the shattered floors, you say? Something terrible came this way and shook up the very foundations of the earth, from the look of it -- but at least one good thing came from it.'
'Be careful with the narfulz ore, [placeholder]. While it should not take to the flame until it is powdered, it has been long since any dwarf has worked it.'
You have discovered a highly unusual ore in the cracks of Khurjezer, churned up by whatever force shattered the bridge and the floors around the chasm.
Narfulz ore can be found at the Crack's Edge in the centre Nud-melek.\n\nYou should collect Narfulz ore in Nud-melek.
You have collected several rare pieces of Ore as a trophy of your adventures in Nud-melek.
